name: Logickies
description:
Logickies

Basic Info
  • Made by Arcaspai
  • Version: 0. 0. 0.
  • Genre: Arcanepunk Action Adventure
  • Engine: Gdevelop 5
Notice
  • Modifications and Redistributions: Prohibited (except for translation)
    If you would like to translate, please contact us at the email below.
  • Make a video or Streaming:
    1. Non-commercial broadcasting is possible.
    2. Do not use the ending illustration as a thumbnail.
    3. For commercial broadcasts, please let us know before broadcasting.
  • For other inquiries, please contact arcaspai.redder@gmail.com.
Manual
  • Arrow keys－move to directed way
  • Arrow keys+Shift－quick move
  • Esc－menu
  • Enter－interaction or talk
